name: what-s-the-link
title: What's the Link?
description: Simple DDL/Torrent/Ed2k download link metadata query service, which can support you to know the link before downloading.
author: Lemon

commands.name: whatslink-info
commands.title: Whatslink.info
commands.description: Support DDL/Torrent/Ed2k download link metadata query service

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
